title: 单向门（害人用的）
txt_content:
[img]file:///C:/Program%20Files/Tencent/QQ/Users/1010259841/Image/Image2/$XNH31EP4WPB~S%7BK2Z7@[05.jpg[/img] 
钻石，我挖！

file:///C:/Program%20Files/Tencent/QQ/Users/1010259841/Image/Image2/I_N0DJ%7B_FEM20G%7D%7B2U$ZH20.jpg 
挖掉了！准备出去！
file:///C:/Program%20Files/Tencent/QQ/Users/1010259841/Image/Image2/58M@%606%60C(9SJFY2%25%25FQNJKY.jpg 

门是开着的！

[img]file:///C:/Program%20Files/Tencent/QQ/Users/1010259841/Image/Image2/TQ%7BL4QAA)S2UHJVH7[3%7DJ%7BC.jpg[/img] 
踏板...
出不去了...
file:///C:/Program%20Files/Tencent/QQ/Users/1010259841/Image/Image2/31I~E)2)M00RI~~VT24PSSB.jpg 
踩上去门就关了...
这是我第一次发帖，求人气。
做人呢，要厚道，看帖回帖。
完毕
